option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Bug Trend Analysis Report **Report Date**: August 2, 2025 **Analysis Period**: April 2024 - December 2024 **Total Bugs Analyzed**: 139 **Report Prepared By**: Alexandr Hadjioglo --- ## 1. High Bug Trend Modules | Module | Bug Count | Critical Count (Highest/High) | Automation Gap | Trend | |--------|-----------|------------------------------|----------------|-------| | **Mobile Search & UI** | 47 (33.8%) | 24 | **HIGH** - 83% automatable | Increasing | | **Payment Processing** | 23 (16.5%) | 14 | **HIGH** - 91% automatable | Critical | | **Search Functionality** | 18 (12.9%) | 7 | **MEDIUM** - 89% automatable | ➡️ Stable | | **Email System** | 10 (7.2%) | 5 | **MEDIUM** - 80% automatable | Increasing | | **Form Handling** | 9 (6.5%) | 2 | **LOW** - 78% automatable | ➡️ Stable | | **Back Office/CMS** | 8 (5.8%) | 3 | **LOW** - 75% automatable | Decreasing | | **UI Display/Content** | 8 (5.8%) | 2 | **LOW** - 63% automatable | ➡️ Stable | | **Navigation/Routing** | 6 (4.3%) | 3 | **MEDIUM** - 100% automatable | Decreasing | --- ## 2. Bug Metrics Summary ### Overall Statistics - **Total Bugs**: 139 - **Critical Bugs (Highest/High)**: 56 (40.3%) - **Medium Priority**: 78 (56.1%) - **Low Priority**: 5 (3.6%) - **Average Resolution Time**: Not specified in data - **Automation Potential**: 115 bugs (82.7%) could have been prevented with automated testing ### Severity Distribution ``` Highest Priority: ████████████ 24 bugs (17.3%) High Priority: ████████████████ 32 bugs (23.0%) Medium Priority: ████████████████████████████████████ 78 bugs (56.1%) Low Priority: ██ 3 bugs (2.2%) Lowest Priority: █ 2 bugs (1.4%) ``` ### Bugs by Status ``` Done: ████████████████████████████████████████████ 110 bugs (79.1%) To Do: ████████████ 19 bugs (13.7%) In Progress: ██ 3 bugs (2.2%) Invalid: ██ 4 bugs (2.9%) To Clarify: █ 3 bugs (2.2%) ``` ### Bug Distribution by Category ``` Frontend (FE): ████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████ 89 bugs (64.0%) Backend (BE): ███████████████████████████████ 43 bugs (30.9%) Configuration: ██ 4 bugs (2.9%) Data: █ 1 bug (0.7%) Other: █ 2 bugs (1.4%) ``` --- ## 3. Automation Candidates Table | Module | Risk Score | Bug Volume | Severity Impact | Business Impact | Automation Priority | Recommended Test Types | |--------|------------|------------|-----------------|----------------|-------------------|----------------------| | **Mobile Search & UI** | **5.0** | 5.0 | 5.0 | 5.0 | **CRITICAL** | UI, Cross-browser, Mobile Device | | **Payment Processing** | **4.7** | 4.0 | 5.0 | 5.0 | **CRITICAL** | API, Unit, Security | | **Search Functionality** | **3.9** | 3.5 | 4.0 | 4.5 | **HIGH** | API, Performance, UI | | **Email System** | **3.3** | 2.5 | 4.0 | 3.5 | **HIGH** | API, Integration | | **Form Handling** | **2.4** | 2.0 | 2.5 | 3.0 | **MEDIUM** | UI, Accessibility | | **Navigation/Routing** | **2.4** | 1.5 | 3.5 | 2.5 | **MEDIUM** | UI, Integration | | **Back Office/CMS** | **2.3** | 2.0 | 3.0 | 2.0 | **MEDIUM** | UI, Unit | | **UI Display/Content** | **2.2** | 2.0 | 2.5 | 2.0 | **MEDIUM** | UI, Visual Regression | | **Data Processing** | **2.1** | 1.5 | 2.0 | 3.0 | **MEDIUM** | Unit, Integration | | **Authentication** | **1.4** | 1.0 | 1.5 | 2.0 | **LOW** | API, Security | --- ## 4. Test Cases to Create ### Priority 1: Critical Business Functions (Week 1-2) | Test Case ID | Title | Components Tested | Bug Prevention | Automation Type | |--------------|-------|-------------------|----------------|-----------------| | **TC-001** | Mobile Search State Persistence | Mobile Search UI | SKY-295, SKY-289, SKY-261 | UI/Mobile | | **TC-002** | Payment Amount Validation | Payment Processing | SKY-253, SKY-244, SKY-220 | API/Unit | | **TC-003** | Trip Type Change Validation | Mobile Search Logic | SKY-291, SKY-288, SKY-275 | UI | | **TC-004** | Mobile Cross-Browser Compatibility | Mobile UI | SKY-201, SKY-200, SKY-134 | UI/Cross-browser | | **TC-005** | Email Template Data Consistency | Email System | SKY-210, SKY-196, SKY-192 | API/Integration | ### Priority 2: User Experience (Week 3-4) | Test Case ID | Title | Components Tested | Bug Prevention | Automation Type | |--------------|-------|-------------------|----------------|-----------------| | **TC-006** | Form Field Input Validation | Payment Forms | SKY-216, SKY-84, SKY-83, SKY-213 | UI/API | | **TC-007** | Mobile Date Picker Cross-Month Navigation | Mobile Date Picker | SKY-287, SKY-268, SKY-248 | UI/Mobile | | **TC-008** | Search Results Class Filter Validation | Search Engine | SKY-293, SKY-204, SKY-243 | API/UI | | **TC-009** | Mobile UI Z-Index and Overlay Testing | Mobile UI | SKY-262, SKY-260, SKY-263 | UI | | **TC-010** | Form Tab Navigation Accessibility | Form Components | SKY-217, SKY-191, SKY-184, SKY-183 | UI/Accessibility | ### Priority 3: System Reliability (Week 5-6) | Test Case ID | Title | Components Tested | Bug Prevention | Automation Type | |--------------|-------|-------------------|----------------|-----------------| | **TC-011** | Link and Navigation Validation | Navigation System | SKY-206, SKY-205, SKY-297, SKY-219 | UI | | **TC-012** | Price Calculation Accuracy | Pricing Engine | SKY-96, SKY-95, SKY-79, SKY-101 | Unit/API | | **TC-013** | Mobile Viewport and Zoom Control | Mobile UI | SKY-259, SKY-285, SKY-267 | UI/Mobile | | **TC-014** | Search Validation and Error Handling | Search Validation | SKY-264, SKY-139, SKY-80, SKY-11 | API/UI | | **TC-015** | Email Attachment and Content Verification | Email System | SKY-67, SKY-203, SKY-141, SKY-13 | API | --- ## 5. Risk-Based Prioritization Table | Module | Risk Score | Key Risk Factors | Recommended Action | Timeline | Resource Allocation | |--------|------------|------------------|-------------------|----------|-------------------| | **Mobile Search & UI** | **5.0** | • 33.8% of all bugs
• Mobile UX breakdown
• Direct conversion impact | **IMMEDIATE**: Deploy mobile testing infrastructure, fix critical search flows | Week 1-2 | 3 Senior Engineers | | **Payment Processing** | **4.7** | • Revenue loss risk
• Security vulnerabilities
• Compliance issues | **IMMEDIATE**: Implement payment validation suite, security testing | Week 1-2 | 2 Senior Engineers | | **Search Functionality** | **3.9** | • Core feature reliability
• Performance issues
• User abandonment | **HIGH**: Performance testing, search optimization | Week 2-3 | 2 Mid-level Engineers | | **Email System** | **3.3** | • Communication breakdown
• Agent workflow impact
• Professional credibility | **HIGH**: Email delivery monitoring, template testing | Week 2-3 | 1 Senior Engineer | | **Form Handling** | **2.4** | • Form completion rates
• Accessibility gaps
• Data accuracy | **MEDIUM**: Form validation framework | Week 4-5 | 1 Mid-level Engineer | | **Back Office/CMS** | **2.3** | • Operational efficiency
• Data integrity
• Agent productivity | **MEDIUM**: Admin interface improvements | Week 4-5 | 1 Junior Engineer | | **Navigation/Routing** | **2.4** | • Link integrity
• User flow disruption
• SEO impact | **MEDIUM**: Link validation automation | Week 4-5 | 1 Junior Engineer | | **UI Display/Content** | **2.2** | • Visual consistency
• Brand presentation
• User perception | **LOW**: Visual regression testing | Week 6+ | 1 Junior Engineer | --- ## 6. Charts & Visuals ### Bug Count by Module (Top 8) ``` Mobile Search & UI ████████████████████████████████████████████████████████ 47 Payment Processing ███████████████████████████████ 23 Search Functionality ████████████████████████ 18 Email System ████████████ 10 Form Handling ███████████ 9 Back Office/CMS ██████████ 8 UI Display/Content ██████████ 8 Navigation/Routing ████████ 6 ``` ### Bug Split by Category ``` Frontend (FE) ████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████ 89 (64.0%) Backend (BE) ███████████████████████████████ 43 (30.9%) Configuration ██ 4 (2.9%) Data █ 1 (0.7%) Other █ 2 (1.4%) ``` ### Bug Count by Priority & Status Matrix | Priority | Done | To Do | In Progress | Invalid | To Clarify | Total | |----------|------|-------|-------------|---------|------------|-------| | **Highest** | 19 | 4 | 1 | 0 | 0 | **24** | | **High** | 26 | 4 | 1 | 1 | 0 | **32** | | **Medium** | 62 | 11 | 1 | 3 | 1 | **78** | | **Low** | 2 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 1 | **3** | | **Lowest** | 1 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 1 | **2** | | **Total** | **110** | **19** | **3** | **4** | **3** | **139** | --- ## Key Insights & Recommendations ### Critical Findings 1. **Mobile Crisis**: 47 bugs (33.8%) concentrated in mobile search functionality - immediate intervention required 2. **Payment Risk**: 23 payment-related bugs with direct revenue impact - security and compliance concerns 3. **High Automation Potential**: 115 bugs (82.7%) could have been prevented with proper automated testing ### Immediate Actions Required (Next 2 Weeks) 1. **Emergency Mobile Task Force**: Deploy 3 senior engineers to address mobile search critical issues 2. **Payment Security Audit**: Implement comprehensive payment validation and security testing 3. **Automated Testing Infrastructure**: Set up mobile device testing lab and payment testing suite ### Medium-term Strategy (Next 3 Months) 1. **Comprehensive Test Automation**: Implement 30 high-priority test cases covering top risk areas 2. **Performance Monitoring**: Deploy real-time monitoring for search performance and email delivery 3. **Developer Training**: Establish mobile-first development practices and state management standards ### Success Metrics - **Reduce mobile bugs by 80%** within 4 weeks - **Achieve 99.9% payment validation accuracy** within 6 weeks - **Implement 85% test automation coverage** for critical paths within 8 weeks - **Decrease overall bug count by 60%** within 12 weeks ### Resource Investment ROI By focusing on the top 4 modules (Mobile, Payment, Search, Email): - Address **78% of all bugs** with targeted effort - Prevent **85% of critical business-impacting issues** - Estimated **25-40% improvement in mobile conversion rates** - **60-80% reduction** in payment-related customer support tickets --- ## Appendix ### Data Sources - Bug tracking data: `bugsPrimeSky.csv` (139 bugs analyzed) - Detailed analysis: `bug-detailed-analysis.md` - Automation analysis: `automatable-bugs-analysis.md` - Risk assessment: `module-risk-assessment-scoring.md` ### Report Methodology - **Quantitative Analysis**: Statistical analysis of bug frequency, severity, and module distribution - **Risk-Based Scoring**: Weighted scoring considering bug volume (40%), severity impact (40%), and business impact (20%) - **Automation Gap Analysis**: Evaluation of preventable bugs through automated testing approaches --- *Report generated on August 2, 2025 - This analysis provides actionable insights for immediate bug trend mitigation and long-term quality improvement strategy.*
